hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah ibn Jundub: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone finds his very property with a man, he is more entitled to it (than anyone else), and the buyer should pursue the one who sold it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَجِدُ عَيْنَ مَالِهِ عِنْدَ رَجُلٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Man Who Finds His Exact Property With Another Man
